de.thkoeln.bibl.api.lms

Interface Connectable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SLNPConnection

    public interface Connectable
    Interface describes default methods to communicate with an LMS.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Closes the connection to the LMS
      java.lang.String getEncoding()
      Returns the character encoding of the connection
      java.io.InputStream getInputStream()
      Returns an input stream for reading from the LMS connection
      java.io.OutputStream getOutputStream()
      Returns an output stream for writing to the LMS connection
      boolean isConnected()
      Returns the connection status
      void open()
      Opens a connection to the LMS

    • Method Detail

      • open

        void open()
   throws LMSException
        Opens a connection to the LMS
        Throws:
        LMSException - if an error occurred while opening the connection

      • close

        void close()
    throws LMSException
        Closes the connection to the LMS
        Throws:
        LMSException - if an error occurred while closing the connection

      • getInputStream

        java.io.InputStream getInputStream()
        Returns an input stream for reading from the LMS connection
        Returns:
        an readable input stream

      • getOutputStream

        java.io.OutputStream getOutputStream()
        Returns an output stream for writing to the LMS connection
        Returns:
        an writable output stream

      • getEncoding

        java.lang.String getEncoding()
        Returns the character encoding of the connection
        Returns:
        a string representation of the charset encoding

      • isConnected

        boolean isConnected()
        Returns the connection status
        Returns:
        a boolean indicating the connection status
